an4.118:1.1: “Mendicants, a faithful gentleman should go to see these four inspiring places.
an4.118:1.3: Thinking: ‘Here the Realized One was born!’—that is an inspiring place.
an4.118:1.4: Thinking: ‘Here the Realized One became awakened as a supreme fully awakened Buddha!’—that is an inspiring place.
an4.118:1.5: Thinking: ‘Here the Realized One rolled forth the supreme Wheel of Dhamma!’—that is an inspiring place.
an4.118:1.6: Thinking: ‘Here the Realized One became fully extinguished through the natural principle of extinguishment, without anything left over!’—that is an inspiring place.
an4.118:1.7: These are the four inspiring places that a faithful gentleman should go to see.”
